text: Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Tenzi vangu vakava vanokomekedza ruenzaniso uye (vakati) munofanira kutarisa ivo chete munzvimbo yose yekunamatira muminamato, uye mova munovakumbira (Allah) muchiita chitendero chavo chete. Sekukusikai kwavakaita pakutanga, muchava munodzoka kuupenyu (Pazuva Rekutongwa).”
